class RedisWQ[source]

RedisWQ(name, **redis_kwargs)

Simple Finite Work Queue with Redis Backend This work queue is finite: as long as no more work is added after workers start, the workers can detect when the queue is completely empty. The items in the work queue are assumed to have unique values. This object is not intended to be used by multiple threads concurrently.

{% endraw %}
